utsuhoReiuji:NuclearVisor.NAME: Nuclear Visor
utsuhoReiuji:NuclearVisor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal half your block as damage back.

utsuhoReiuji:EightfoldConduct.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Hellbound: Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

utsuhoReiuji:SelfTokamak.NAME: Self Tokamak
utsuhoReiuji:SelfTokamak.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the next turn, gain !B! block.

utsuhoReiuji:VengefulSpirits.NAME: Vengeful Spirits
utsuhoReiuji:VengefulSpirits.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Fission: Draw !utsuhoReiuji:SecondM! cards. Deal 1 damage !M! times.

utsuhoReiuji:HighTensionBlade.NAME: High Tension Blade

utsuhoReiuji:CreepingSun.NAME: Creeping Sun
utsuhoReiuji:CreepingSun.DESCRIPTION: Until you play an attack, each card you play increases the damage of your next attack by !M!.

utsuhoReiuji:TheTenSuns.NAME: The Ten Suns
utsuhoReiuji:TheTenSuns.DESCRIPTION: The next card you play gains utsuhoreiuji:Chain_Reaction .

utsuhoReiuji:CannonCross.NAME: Cannon Cross
utsuhoReiuji:CannonCross.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, deal twice as much.

utsuhoReiuji:EightSpanPath:.NAME: Eight Span Path
utsuhoReiuji:EightSpanPath:.DESCRIPTION: All cards gain: NL Hellbound: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity

utsuhoReiuji:EightfoldResolve.NAME: Eightfold Resolve

ustuhoReiuji:EightfoldEffort.NAME: Eightfold Effort
ustuhoReiuji:EightfoldEffort.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Energy. NL Hellbound: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn.

utsuhoReiuji:AbyssNova.NAME: Abyss Nova
utsuhoReiuji:AbyssNova.DESCRIPTION: Choose 5 cards in your exhaust pile. Exhaust your deck. Put those cards in your hand. NL They cost 0 this turn.

utsuhoReiuji:BecquerelAndCall.NAME: Becquerel And Call
utsuhoReiuji:BecquerelAndCall.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, then place !utsuhoReiuji:SecondM! cards on top of your deck.

utsuhoReiuji:EmergencyShutdown.NAME: Emergency Shutdown
utsuhoReiuji:EmergencyShutdown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. Skip your next turn.

utsuhoReiuji:TwiceAsBright.NAME: Twice As Bright
utsuhoReiuji:TwiceAsBright.DESCRIPTION: Double your energy. NL Fill your hand with burns.

utsuhoReiuji:BanishingStrike.NAME: Banishing Strike
utsuhoReiuji:BanishingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL Reduce this cards damage by 1 for the rest of this combat.

utsuhoReiuji:DefaultCommonPower.NAME: Hold Place
utsuhoReiuji:DefaultCommonPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! utsuhoreiuji:Keyword. NL Keyword keyword keywords

utsuhoReiuji:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
utsuhoReiuji:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

utsuhoReiuji:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
utsuhoReiuji:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
utsuhoReiuji:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

utsuhoReiuji:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
utsuhoReiuji:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

utsuhoReiuji:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !utsuhoReiuji:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

utsuhoReiuji:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
utsuhoReiuji:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !utsuhoReiuji:SecondM! poison to an enemy.

utsuhoReiuji:BurnOut.NAME: Burn Out
utsuhoReiuji:BurnOut.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. Exhaust a card. If a card is exhausted this way, return this card to your hand.

utsuhoReiuji:HelmSplitter.NAME: Helm Splitter
utsuhoReiuji:HelmSplitter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card at random.
utsuhoReiuji:HelmSplitter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card.

utsuhoReiuji:MeltingHurricane.NAME: Melting Hurricane
utsuhoReiuji:MeltingHurricane.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 4 times. NL Fission: Gain 1 Strength

utsuhoReiuji:FissionCrush.NAME: Fission Crush
utsuhoReiuji:FissionCrush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Reduce this card's damage by 1 this combat.

utsuhoReiuji:DeepRepository.NAME: Deep Repository
utsuhoReiuji:DeepRepository.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards from your exhaust pile, put them at the bottom of your draw pile.

utsuhoReiuji:JupitersDescent.NAME: Jupiter's Descent
utsuhoReiuji:JupitersDescent.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of each turn, look at the top two cards of your deck. Play one, and exhaust the other.

utsuhoReiuji:AstralHeat.NAME: Astral Heat
utsuhoReiuji:AstralHeat.DESCRIPTION: Take another turn after this one. NL At the end of that turn, take [#ff0000]108[] damage.
